transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji, hi, good morning, ma'am. 11 Traders?
Customer: Haan, bolunga.
Executive: Main Saurabh Chauhan bol raha hu IndiaMART se. How are you?
Customer: Haan, fine, sir. How are you, sir?
Executive: I'm also good, thank you so much. Ma'am, I just recently received a mail from our side. Actually, Mr. Rakesh Kumar is your account here in IndiaMART. Currently, he's on leave, he's on leave, so I am taking care of your account. So just now we received a mail that we have been associated with IM as a paid seller for the last five, four years. Recently, we upgraded to Maximizer and our account has been assigned to a team from a North region.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: That made coordination difficult for us and I just I just got the mail and just finding that you want a local support from IndiaMART side. Yeah, yeah, of course.
Executive: So, ma'am, is there any issue you are facing with our team who is handling from head office?
Customer: Uh, we have language issue, sir, because we can't call maybe from there, no, because we are from Tamil Nadu, we fluently speak in Tamil. So we can't speak in English very fluently. So we require local person who can speak fluently in our language.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Yeah, ma'am, that's why we require person to visit our office so we have to make a discussion on that, sir.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: So another our company another thing interesting we are having a local support. So we require also it's really like this one.
Executive: So I'm also seeing that you also mentioned one company name that is Adnan Industries. It is also your company.
Customer: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Yeah, that's another company, sir.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: I guess it is your also company.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: It is also your company. Yeah, yeah. Yeah, we have both companies. So we require local support. One person is handling our both companies, it will be helpful for us, sir.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: So I do understand. Maybe I will discuss with Mr. Rakesh Kumar also in that. Haan, Rakesh, yeah, that's that's not a problem. We are satisfied with him, but we require more convenient in Chennai, local support.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Please just as your one company is already in the field side, so you wanted 11 Traders will also move to field and you want that your both the companies will be taken care by your field officer only.
Customer: Yeah, yeah, yeah.
Executive: Regarding the same, ma'am, I will discuss with my internal team and just try to resolve your issue on priority basis. Okay. You want this issue, you want to register your company into field. Ma'am, both your companies are registered on the same address?
Customer: No, no, it's a different same location, but same surrounding. It's Longadu, same same pin code. It's nearby only, sir.
Executive: Okay, both companies registered on the same pin code?
Customer: Same, not a same pin code, but it will be near only. It's around 3 kilometers, within 10 kilometers both companies are available, sir.
Executive: Okay, means it's a near near about.
Customer: Haan, nearby.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay. Okay, ma'am. Ma'am, is there any other issue you are facing in the service part from IndiaMART regarding buyleads and inquiry?
Customer: Not much, sir. That's what that's what we will discuss with local person, that will be more helpful, sir. More convenient we can speak.
Executive: Then after that in the service part there is no issue you are getting proper inquiries and buyleads from our side, right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ma'am, you are the proper decision maker of the firm? Company registered on your name? You are the decision maker of the firm, ma'am?
Customer: Yeah, yeah, yeah, sir.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay. Ma'am, I will just discuss with my team, with my senior manager regarding your issue and surely I will again get back to you after understanding your concern. We received your mail in the morning and we just reached the office just me on initial basis we connected with you, right?
Customer: Okay, sir.
Executive: Before that I'm also seeing that previously you also raised a complaint that you called on our 9696 customer care.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: I'm also seeing that in August month you also changed request to change your company address. So it was done in August month, ma'am?
Customer: I'm I'm having another meeting in five minutes, sir. Yeah, please accept my request, sir. I'm getting it.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: I will
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants local support due to language barrier.

- Wants both companies to be field registered.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to discuss with internal team.

- Executive confirmed receiving the customer's mail.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will get back to the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- local support, language, field registration, buyleads
